AT.name: A Drawing's Journey
AT.description: Wussten Sie, dass jede Zeichnung, die wir machen, in der Welt der Zeichnungen zum Leben kommen kann ? Ein Bewohner dieser Welt kontaktiert dich, weil er deine Hilfe braucht ! Um Sie zu überzeugen, ihm zu helfen, bietet er an, Ihnen seine Missgeschicke zu erzählen. Mit ihm gehst du von einem Blatt Papier zu einem anderen, jeder mit einem handgezeichneten Hintergrund. Bleistift, Pastell, Malerei... Detaillierte oder einfache... Jeder besuchte Ort ist einzigartig ! Sprechen Sie mit anderen Zeichnungen, holen Sie und verwenden Sie Objekte, um Ihre Reise voranzutreiben. Einige Gefahren können sich auch als nützlich erweisen : Tintenfleck, zerrissenes Blatt... Führen Sie alle Aktionen mit einfachen Bedienelementen aus : Zeigen Sie einfach Elemente auf dem Bildschirm mit der Wiimote und drücken Sie eine einzelne Taste, um die meisten Interaktionen zu realisieren. Gehen Sie also auf die Reise einer Zeichnung ("A Drawing's Journey") !

AU.name: A Drawing's Journey
AU.description: Did you know that every drawing we make can come to life in the World of Drawings ? A resident of this world contacts you because he needs your help ! To convince you to help him, he offers to tell you his misadventures. With him you'll go from one sheet of paper to another, each with a hand-drawn background. Pencil, pastel, painting... Detailed or simplistic... Every place visited is unique ! Talk to other drawings, pick up and use objects to advance your journey. Some dangers may also prove useful : ink stain, torn sheet... Perform all actions with simple controls : just point elements on the screen with the Wiimote and press a single button to realize most interactions. So go on to A Drawing's Journey !

BG.name: A Drawing's Journey
BG.description: Did you know that every drawing we make can come to life in the World of Drawings ? A resident of this world contacts you because he needs your help ! To convince you to help him, he offers to tell you his misadventures. With him you'll go from one sheet of paper to another, each with a hand-drawn background. Pencil, pastel, painting... Detailed or simplistic... Every place visited is unique ! Talk to other drawings, pick up and use objects to advance your journey. Some dangers may also prove useful : ink stain, torn sheet... Perform all actions with simple controls : just point elements on the screen with the Wiimote and press a single button to realize most interactions. So go on to A Drawing's Journey !

BE.name: A Drawing's Journey
BE.description: Saviez-vous que chaque dessin que nous réalisons peut prendre vie dans le Monde des Dessins ? Un de ses habitants vous contacte car il a besoin de votre aide ! Pour vous convaincre de lui venir en aide, il vous propose de vous raconter ses mésaventures. Avec lui vous allez passer d'une feuille de papier à une autre, chacune comportant un décor dessiné à la main. Crayon, pastel, peinture... Détaillé ou simpliste... Chaque endroit visité est unique ! Parlez à d'autres dessins, ramassez et utilisez des objets pour avancer dans votre voyage. Certains dangers pourraient également se révéler utiles : tache d'encre, feuille déchirée... Effectuez toutes les actions grâce à des contrôles simples : il suffit de pointer les éléments à l'écran avec la Wiimote et la plupart des interactions sont réalisées avec un seul bouton. Alors en route pour A Drawing's Journey ("le Voyage d'un Dessin") !

ES.name: A Drawing's Journey
ES.description: ¿ Sabías que cada dibujo que hacemos puede cobrar vida en el mundo de los dibujos ? ¡ Un residente de este mundo te contacta porque necesita tu ayuda ! Para convencerle de que lo ayude, se ofrece a contarle sus desventuras. Con él pasará de una hoja de papel a otra, cada una con un fondo dibujado a mano. Lápiz, pastel, pintura... Detallada o simplista... Cada lugar visitado es único ! Hable con otros dibujos, recoja y use objetos para avanzar en su viaje. Algunos peligros también pueden ser útiles : manchas de tinta, hojas rotas... Realiza todas las acciones con controles simples : solo apunta elementos en la pantalla con el Wiimote y presiona un solo botón para realizar la mayoría de las interacciones. ¡ Así que continúa el viaje de un dibujo ("A Drawing's Journey") !

FI.name: A Drawing's Journey

IT.name: A Drawing's Journey
IT.description: Lo sapevate che ogni disegno che facciamo può venire alla vita nel mondo dei disegni ? Un residente di questo mondo contatti voi, perché ha bisogno del vostro aiuto ! Per convincervi ad aiutarlo, egli offre di dirvi le sue disavventure. Con lui andrete da un foglio di carta ad un altro, ognuno con uno sfondo disegnato a mano. Matita, pastello, pittura... Dettagliato o semplicistica... Ogni luogo visitato è unico ! Parlare con altri disegni, raccogliere e utilizzare gli oggetti per far progredire il vostro viaggio. Alcuni pericoli possono anche rivelarsi utili : macchia d'inchiostro, foglio strappato... Eseguire tutte le azioni con comandi semplici : basta puntare gli elementi sullo schermo con il Wiimote e premere un solo pulsante per realizzare la maggior parte delle interazioni. Quindi, andare A Drawing's Journey ("viaggio di un disegno") !

Detailed or simplistic... Every place visited is unique ! Talk to other drawings, pick up and use objects to advance your journey. Some dangers may also prove useful : ink stain, torn sheet... NL.name: A Drawing's Journey
NL.description: Wist u dat elke tekening die we maken tot leven kan komen in de wereld van de tekeningen ? Een inwoner van deze wereld contact met u opneemt, want hij heeft jouw hulp nodig ! Om u te overtuigen om hem te helpen, biedt hij om u te vertellen zijn tegenspoed. Met hem ga je van het ene vel papier naar de andere, elk met een met de hand getekende achtergrond. Potlood, pastel, schilderen... Gedetailleerde of simplistisch... Elke bezochte plaats is uniek ! Praat met andere tekeningen, pick-up en het gebruik van voorwerpen om je reis te bevorderen. Sommige risico's kunnen ook nuttig kunnen zijn : inktvlek, gescheurde vel... Voer alle handelingen met eenvoudige bediening : alleen punt elementen op het scherm met de Wiimote en druk op een enkele knop voor de meeste interacties te realiseren. Dus ga op reis van een tekening van ("A Drawing's Journey") !

NZ.name: A Drawing's Journey
NZ.description: Did you know that every drawing we make can come to life in the World of Drawings ? A resident of this world contacts you because he needs your help ! To convince you to help him, he offers to tell you his misadventures. With him you'll go from one sheet of paper to another, each with a hand-drawn background. Pencil, pastel, painting... Detailed or simplistic... Every place visited is unique ! Talk to other drawings, pick up and use objects to advance your journey. Some dangers may also prove useful : ink stain, torn sheet... PL.name: A Drawing's Journey
PL.description: Did you know that every drawing we make can come to life in the World of Drawings ? A resident of this world contacts you because he needs your help ! To convince you to help him, he offers to tell you his misadventures. With him you'll go from one sheet of paper to another, each with a hand-drawn background. Pencil, pastel, painting... Detailed or simplistic... Every place visited is unique ! Talk to other drawings, pick up and use objects to advance your journey. Some dangers may also prove useful : ink stain, torn sheet... Perform all actions with simple controls : just point elements on the screen with the Wiimote and press a single button to realize most interactions. So go on to A Drawing's Journey !

PT.name: A Drawing's Journey
PT.description: Você sabia que cada desenho que fazemos pode vir à vida no Mundo dos Desenhos ? Um residente deste mundo entra em contato com você porque ele precisa de sua ajuda ! Para convencê-lo a ajudá-lo, ele oferece para lhe dizer suas desventuras. Com ele você vai de uma folha de papel para outra, cada uma com um fundo desenhado à mão. Lápis, pastel, pintura... Detalhado ou simplista... Cada lugar visitado é único ! Converse com outros desenhos, pegue e use objetos para avançar sua jornada. Alguns perigos também podem ser úteis : tinta mancha, rasgado folha... Execute todas as ações com controles simples : basta apontar elementos na tela com o Wiimote e pressione um único botão para realizar a maioria das interações. Então, vá para a viagem de um desenho ("A Drawing's Journey") !

RU.name: A Drawing's Journey
RU.description: Знаете ли вы, что каждый рисунок, который мы делаем, может появиться в мире рисунков ? Житель этого мира связывается с вами, потому что он нуждается в вашей помощи ! Чтобы убедить вас помочь ему, он предлагает вам рассказать о своих злоключениях. С ним вы переходите от одного листа бумаги к другому, каждый с нарисованным от руки фоном. Карандаш, пастель, живопись... Подробное или упрощенное... Каждое посещенное место уникально ! Поговорите с другими рисунками, возьмите и используйте предметы, чтобы продвинуть свое путешествие. Некоторые опасности могут также оказаться полезными : пятна краски, рваные листы... Выполните все действия с помощью простых элементов управления : просто выделите элементы на экране с помощью Wiimote и нажмите одну кнопку, чтобы реализовать большинство взаимодействий. Так что отправляйтесь в путешествие по чертежам ("A Drawing's Journey") !

SE.name: A Drawing's Journey
SE.description: Did you know that every drawing we make can come to life in the World of Drawings ? A resident of this world contacts you because he needs your help !
